name: sea view
description: An armchair that allows its occupant to fully relax and enjoy gazing at the horizon, Sea View was originally created as an outdoor piece. Designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2001, it was inspired by the rigour and minimalism of Scandinavian design. Although it offers a contemporary alternative to traditional upholstered pieces, it does not compromise on comfort: made of solid American walnut, it has a generous seat and a backrest in upholstered plywood. The tips of its legs are made of satin nickel brass. The upholstery is available in fabric, leather or natural leather, offering a wide range of options for customisation.
